title: Start Renting or Listing Equipment Today!
description: Whether you need equipment, have equipment to rent, or are looking to offer or find labor services, join us and make farming easier, more efficient, and cost-effective.
role_prompt: Please select your role to get started. Are you a Farmer or a Laborer?
heading: Why FarmRent?
description1: Unlock the power of smart farming with our advanced rental system.

features.title: Smart Equipment Catalog
features.description: Browse a wide range of farming equipment with detailed specifications and availability.

features.title: Intelligent Scheduling

features.title: Location-Based Services

renterSteps.subtext: Explore various farming tools and machines.
Choose the right equipment for your needs.
Get the equipment delivered to your location.
Send the equipment back after usage.

supplierSteps.subtext: Sign up and add your equipment details.

whatIs: What is the Farming Equipment Rental System?
whatIsAnswer: It is a platform where farmers can rent or lease agricultural equipment easily, ensuring affordability and accessibility.
howToRentAnswer: Sign up for an account, browse available equipment, check availability, and make a booking online.
securityDeposit: Is there a security deposit required?
securityDepositAnswer: Yes, a refundable security deposit may be required depending on the equipment provider's policy.
listEquipment: Can I list my own farming equipment for rent?
listEquipmentAnswer: Yes! Equipment owners can register and list their farming tools or machinery for rent.
customerSupportAnswer: Yes, we provide 24/7 customer support to assist with any queries or issues.

welcome.title: WELCOME BACK!
welcome.message: You're just one step away from a smarter and more efficient equipment rental experience
